basic.floral_language:
Perilla frutescens
Floriography: friendly, vigorous, kindly
Is a spice plant, with green or purple leaf colors, broad ovate leaves which are serrated covered with hairs, leaves are wrinkled, full of a special scent, may be used for cooking or fragrance, 
Likes sunshine, tolerates shade, shade properly under summer strong sunlight, flowering in August-November, white or purple red color.
basic.color: Leaf color purple or green, flower color white or fuchsia

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, more resistance to shade, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Not resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove old diseased and dead leaves timely
